# Readme

This repository contains code and data associated with "The Diversity-Innovation Paradox in Science." arXiv  preprint can be found [here](https://arxiv.org/abs/1909.02063).




For raw data of ProQuest or the Web of Science:
- ProQuest
- Web of Science

For inferring gender and race associated with names:
- US Census Data
- Social Security Administration Data
- Florida Voter Registration Data
